medical_assessment.purpose: Determine if a driver is mentally and physically fit to drive safely.
trigger_conditions: Applying for C, CE, D, DE license categories

steps: CBR reviews answers and previous medical info
Request for doctor or specialist report if needed
Final decision: rijgeschikt, rijgeschikt met beperkingen, niet rijgeschikt

doctor_responsibilities.inform_patient: Explain impact of condition on driving ability
submission_methods: Paper form to CBR divisie Rijgeschiktheid

mandatory_for: Certain conditions under Regeling Eisen Geschiktheid 2000

decision_outcomes: Afzien (application closed due to missing info)
